Title: Requires that plaintiffs no longer have to prove that a sexual offense occurred on the premises of, chattels or property belonging to a corporate entity
Summary: Requires that plaintiffs no longer have to prove that a sexual offense occurred on the premises of, chattels or property belonging to a corporate entity in action for negligent supervision.
LawCode: Add ยง18-202, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to changing what needs to be proven in an action for negligent supervision
